channel.title: Rs-Legends - 2006 Revision Pk'ing Server - 24-7 Uptime - Economy-Play instantly
channel.description:
[center]-FORUMS- Www.Rs-Legends.Com
(webclient available on website)
Rs-Legends is a brand new server with 2006 revision graphics etc.
Here at Rs-Legends, we plan to blow all the competition out of the water. We have experienced coder's who will be adding/changing Game-content to perfection for you players. There is a 100% *Fully Working Webclient* & *Downloadable Client* (click the "Play Webclient" tab , or download the client from forums" Tired of all those "lime whips, barrows partyhats, ancient godsword's" etc? I don't know about you guys, but i prefer "Real" oldschool runescape items to bring the game back to how it was during 2006-2007. not all of these Ridiculously Custom-Made Items that have no purpose in-game whatsoever.
We Have a 100% coded and accurate "Hit Formula" no more will you hit constant 0's or low hit's only expect the Best from Rs-Legends. [/center]
